failure.message:

DELETE /api/auth/user/johndoe1 should respond with status code 200, responded: 401 Response body: { "timestamp" : "2024-01-24T18:40:16.665+00:00", "status" : 401, "error" : "Unauthorized", "message" : "Unauthorized", "path" : "/api/auth/user/johndoe1" }
